question: Luis Arce, who was seen in news recently, has been elected as the new President of which country?
explanation:
Luis Arce has been elected as the new President of Bolivia. The leftist leader has secured a landslide victory in the recently conducted Presidential election.
Luis Arce served as the Economy minister for several years under the first Indigenous President, Morales. He was known for developing the boom years of the country from the mid-2000s and in reducing poverty.
